0.name: Thwack
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Sheathed Blade
0.fullDesc: Increases Seele's SPD by {{2}}% for {{3}} turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and increases SPD.

0.name: Butterfly Flurry
0.fullDesc: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of her ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Enters the <color=#f29e38ff>buffed state</color> and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Phantom Illusion
0.fullDesc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for {{1}} second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.
0.shortDesc: Enter <color=#f29e38ff>Stealth</color> mode. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, enter the <color=#f29e38ff>buffed state</color>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
